actions.text: On agreeing to the Schrader amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 238 (Roll no. 896).

description: Amendment sought to require a cost benefit analysis to be included with reports to Congress and to require agencies to submit criteria for cost benefit analyses to Congress within 12 months of enactment.
purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 112-311 to require a cost benefit analysis to be included with reports to Congress and require agencies to submit criteria for cost benefit analyses to Congress within 12 months of enactment.
